file.name: oapi-split.yaml
file.content:
---
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Simple API
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: 'http: //localhost:3333'
paths:
  '/user':
    post:
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: 'file://./oapi-split-types.yaml#/components/schemas/User'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Newly Created User
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: 'oapi-split-types.yaml#/components/schemas/NewUser'
    get:
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Loaded User
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './oapi-split-types.yaml#/components/schemas/User'

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: path "/user": get: responses: 200: content: application/json: schema: at 1:153: parse schema: resolve "./oapi-split-types.yaml#/components/schemas/User": external "./oapi-split-types.yaml": get: file: local file reference is not allowed
